UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile on the SeaJourney Landing website.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

profilePicture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short biography or description of the user.

registrationDate.description: Date and time when the user registered.

role.description: The user's role, determining their permissions.

subscriptionStatus.description: The status of the user's subscription.

Testimonial.title: Testimonial
Testimonial.description: Represents a user testimonial about the AI tour creator feature.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Testimonial entity.

content.description: The text content of the testimonial.

rating.description: The rating given in the testimonial (e.g., 1-5 stars).

dateCreated.description: Date and time when the testimonial was created.

Vessel.title: Vessel
Vessel.description: Represents a vessel that a user has worked on.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Vessel entity.

type.description: The type of vessel (e.g., Motor Yacht, Sailing Yacht).

officialNumber.description: The official registration number of the vessel.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns this vessel entry.

CurrentStatus.title: CurrentStatus
CurrentStatus.description: Represents the user's current active trip.

vesselId.description: The ID of the vessel for the current trip.

position.description: The user's position or role on the vessel.

startDate.description: The start date of the current trip.

dailyStates.description: A map of dates to vessel states (e.g., 'at-sea', 'in-port').

notes.description: User-added notes for the current trip.

Trip.title: Trip
Trip.description: Represents a user's completed trip record.

vesselId.description: The ID of the vessel for the trip.

position.description: The user's position or role on the vessel.

startDate.description: The start date of the trip.

endDate.description: The end date of the trip.

dailyStates.description: A map of dates to vessel states (e.g., 'at-sea', 'in-port') for the duration of the trip.

VerificationRecord.title: VerificationRecord
VerificationRecord.description: Stores a snapshot of a verifiable record, identified by a unique code.

userId.description: The ID of the user this record belongs to.

recordType.description: The type of record being verified.

issuedAt.description: The timestamp when the verification record was created.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when this verification code expires.

data.description: A snapshot of the key data from the verified record.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore data structure is designed to support the SeaJourney Landing website's user profiles and testimonials. The primary focus is on enabling secure and scalable data access while adhering to Authorization Independence and simplifying security rules. User profiles are stored under `/users/{userId}/profile/{userId}` following the Path-Based ownership access modeling strategy, where the profile document ID is the same as the user ID. This ensures a user can only access their own profile document. Testimonials are stored as subcollections of user profiles under `/users/{userId}/profile/testimonials/{testimonialId}`. By nesting the testimonials as a subcollection under each user profile, we establish clear ownership and enhance data organization. Vessels are stored in a top-level collection for each user `/users/{userId}/vessels/{vesselId}` which also enforces user ownership via the path. The addition of a public `verificationRecords` collection allows anonymous users (like the MCA) to read specific, non-sensitive records for verification purposes without compromising the security of user data.
